gmcm.gemstone_socket_style.title: Gemstone Socket Style
gmcm.gemstone_socket_style.desc: Replaces the generic vanilla "Forged" text in weapon tooltips with actual gemstone socket icons in various styles.
gmcm.gemstone_socket_position.title: Gemstone Socket Position
gmcm.gemstone_socket_position.desc: Determines the relative position where gemstones sockets should be drawn, if enabled.
